Decrypting MessagesÂ¶

Decrypt Message Tab

After the nym is created, go to the Decrypt Message tab. There you can click Retrieve Messages to start aampy and if there are messages sent to you that are tied to your hSub key, they will be displayed in the Messages list box. Clicking on one of the messages will decrypt it and display it in the Content text box. If you wish to keep the message, click Save to Disk. You can also click Reply Message and you will be directed to the Send Message tab.

Note: Clicking on undecrypted messages will delete them when the process is done. If it fails to decrypt then it is useless. If it succeeds, then it becomes useless due to the Axolotl ratchet protocol. You can go to pyaxo to read more about it.
